wikirag-prompt-analyzer: Additional prompts used when analyzing a document during indexing {{notranslate}}
wikirag-ve-magic-label: Label for the magic word switch
wikirag-ve-magic-help: Help text for the magic word switch
wikirag-ve-magic-no: Label to not index this page
wikirag-pageinfo-export-status-exported: Status label indicating the page has been exported
wikirag-pageinfo-export-status-disabled: Status label indicating the page is not exportable
wikirag-pageinfo-export-status-not-expor: Status label indicating the page has not been exported
